CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 14, 1953, pg. 7 reads: "Razing Old Church To Build Anew - Members of St. Paul Baptist congregation observe joyfully the razing of their old church edifice on Broad Street between Evaline and Pacific Avenues in picture... In picture (2) loyal members look on as the pastor, the Rev. George Coles, shovels the earth symbolic of groundbreaking for the new edifice. Their present pastor is a product of St. Paul Church having been active in many capacities through the years from a child in church school to being ordained as pastor of the church. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of St. Paul Baptist Church members, including Rev .George Coles, using shovel during groundbreaking ceremony for new church, another version
